foods.name: Neon Breeze Delight
foods.info: A refreshing combination of grilled shrimp, pineapple salsa, and tropical aioli on a brioche bun.

foods.name: Retro Sunset Bliss
foods.info: Enjoy the flavors of a sunset with grilled chorizo, avocado, and chipotle mayo on a ciabatta roll.

foods.name: Electric Salsa Sizzle
foods.info: Spicy and savory! Jalapeño-infused beef patty, pepper jack cheese, and mango salsa on a pretzel bun.

foods.name: Synthwave Thunder
foods.info: Feel the heat with jerk-seasoned chicken, grilled pineapple, and cilantro-lime mayo on a Hawaiian roll.

foods.name: Radical Heatwave
foods.info: Turn up the heat with cajun-spiced beef, pepper jack cheese, jalapeños, and sriracha mayo on a sesame seed bun.

foods.name: Cuban Fusion Flash
foods.info: A Latin twist! Pulled pork, ham, Swiss cheese, pickles, and mustard on a pressed brioche bun.

foods.name: Mango Tango Groove
foods.info: Savor the sweetness of mango chutney, bacon, and smoked gouda on a sweet potato bun.

foods.name: Coconut Retro Bliss
foods.info: Escape to the tropics with coconut-crusted chicken, pineapple slaw, and lime mayo on a coconut bun.

foods.name: Disco Funky Fusion
foods.info: Disco your way to the '80s with this double Angus beef, truffle aioli, arugula, and tomato on a hip funky bun.

foods.name: Vibrant Veggie Fiesta
foods.info: For the veggie lovers! Black bean patty, avocado, salsa, and cilantro-lime dressing on a whole grain bun.

foods.name: Palms & Pineapple Serenade
foods.info: Tropical paradise in every bite! Grilled chicken, ham, pineapple, and teriyaki mayo on a Hawaiian sweet roll.

foods.name: Synthwave Spice Fusion
foods.info: Experience a fusion of flavors! Spicy beef, chorizo, pepper jack cheese, and chipotle aioli on a jalapeño cheddar bun.

foods.name: Mojito Mojo Rhythm
foods.info: Get zesty with lime-marinated shrimp, mint aioli, and cucumber slaw on a ciabatta roll.

foods.name: Beach Bum BBQ
foods.info: Kick back and relax with barbecue pulled pork, coleslaw, and crispy onion straws on a brioche bun.

foods.name: Cyber Citrus Spark
foods.info: A neon blend of sparkling water infused with lime, lemon, and a hint of mint for a refreshing cyberpunk twist.

foods.name: Retro Galaxy Soda
foods.info: Blast off with this fizzy blue raspberry soda, garnished with a twist of lemon and a sprinkle of edible glitter to bring the galaxy to your glass.

foods.name: Pixelated Mango Tango
foods.info: A digital delight of mango and pineapple juice, mixed with a touch of coconut water and served with a pixel-shaped ice cube.

foods.name: Synthwave Smoothie Blast
foods.info: Ride the synthwave with this smoothie blend of strawberries, bananas, and a scoop of vanilla protein, topped with a splash of almond milk.

foods.name: Electric Blueberry Fusion
foods.info: Electrify your taste buds with this vibrant concoction of blueberries, blackberries, and a hint of lime, charged with a touch of sparkling water.

foods.name: Neon Spice Tornado Fries
foods.info: Crispy spiral-cut potatoes dusted with a neon blend of spicy seasonings, served with a side of cyber aioli.

foods.name: Retro Cheese & Bacon Fries
foods.info: A throwback to classic flavors with crispy fries topped with melted cheddar, chunks of smoked bacon, and a drizzle of retro ranch dressing.

foods.name: Galactic Sweet Potato Fries
foods.info: Sweet potato fries blasted with galactic seasoning and served with a side of starlight BBQ dip.

foods.name: Cybernetic Chocolate Explosion
foods.info: Decadent chocolate lava cake with a core of molten chocolate, served with a scoop of neon mint ice cream.

foods.name: Retro Raspberry Cheesecake Bites
foods.info: Creamy cheesecake bites swirled with raspberry coulis, dusted with powdered sugar, and a sprinkle of retro charm.

foods.name: Synthwave Strawberry Sundae
foods.info: Layers of strawberry ice cream, fresh strawberries, whipped cream, and a touch of synthwave sparkle, topped with a cherry.

foods.name: Electric Pear Crisp
foods.info: Warm pear crisp with a electric oat topping, served with a scoop of vanilla ice cream and caramel drizzle.
